name: part_000
file: tmp_【#ぺこーら24SpecialLive】3D LIVE!!!! 最後は歌って踊って盛り上がるぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [1J1JG99KKCk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening title loop for 'Pekora 24 Special Live' featuring various Hololive members.
Usada Pekora appears on stage to greet the audience and conclude the 24-hour stream with a live performance.
Pekora performs the song 'Ren'ai Nou' on a 3D stage with heart-themed visuals.

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: 24時間配信達成！
subtitles.english: 24-hour stream achievement!

subtitles.original: だけど、だけど、だけど...
subtitles.english: But, but, but...

subtitles.original: まだあるのよね、ここホロライブにてぺこら24スペシャルライブが残ってるのよ！
subtitles.english: There's still more, right? We have the Pekora 24 Special Live here in Hololive!

subtitles.original: 皆さんのおかげでここまで来れて
subtitles.english: I was able to get this far thanks to everyone,

subtitles.original: 是非ね、ちょっと感謝もたくさんたくさん返したいので
subtitles.english: and I really want to give back a lot of gratitude,

subtitles.original: やっぱアイドルぺこですからお歌で返していけたらなと思っております。
subtitles.english: so as an idol, Peko, I'd like to give back through songs.

subtitles.original: そしてゲストさんもたくさんいますのでお楽しみに。
subtitles.english: And there are many guests too, so look forward to it.

subtitles.original: そして5年目もよろしくお願いいたします。
subtitles.english: And please continue to support me in my 5th year.

subtitles.original: そしたら早速1曲目から入っていけたらなと思います。
subtitles.english: So, let's get right into the first song.

subtitles.original: 聞いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen.

subtitles.original: まわる　まわる　ふたりのフィーリング
subtitles.english: Spinning, spinning, our feeling

subtitles.original: 絡まってる　まわってるハート　キミのせいだよ
subtitles.english: Entangled, spinning heart, it's because of you

subtitles.original: LoveやLikeじゃ言い足りない
subtitles.english: Love or Like isn't enough to say

subtitles.original: キミにふわふわしている
subtitles.english: I'm feeling fluffy for you

subtitles.original: 恋愛脳
subtitles.english: Love Brain

subtitles.original: な、ご重症で辛い　今回もこんなんだ
subtitles.english: Wh-, the illness is severe and painful, it's like this again this time

subtitles.original: ろくでもない処方箋では　いられない
subtitles.english: I can't stay with a useless prescription

subtitles.original: は、との重症が舞う　毎回もこんなんだ
subtitles.english: H-, the severity of the heart dances, it's like this every time

subtitles.original: ほっといたら今日も不規則　アホも重症
subtitles.english: If left alone, today is also irregular, even a fool is seriously ill

subtitles.original: そっ、それは罠？　キミと出遭った
subtitles.english: T- That's a trap? I met you

subtitles.original: そこ現実か？　あちらかこちら
subtitles.english: Is that reality? There or here

subtitles.original: ちょっとま、模試見て　かます愛情に
subtitles.english: Wait a bit, look at the mock exam, in the affection I show

subtitles.original: どうにかして振り向いて
subtitles.english: Somehow, look my way

subtitles.original: ワン、ツー、スリーではあらわせない
subtitles.english: Can't be expressed with one, two, three

subtitles.original: この気持ちの重量さ　は仕様
subtitles.english: The weight of this feeling is just how it is

subtitles.original: 駆け引きワードはわかってんだけど言えない
subtitles.english: I know the bargaining words, but I can't say them

subtitles.original: 言えない　まだ曖昧にしたい
subtitles.english: Can't say them, I still want to keep it vague

subtitles.original: まわる　まわる　ふたりのフィーリング
subtitles.english: Spinning, spinning, our feeling

subtitles.original: 絡まってる　まわってるハート　キミのせいだよ
subtitles.english: Entangled, spinning heart, it's because of you

subtitles.original: ショートやデッドじゃ物足りない
subtitles.english: Short or dead isn't enough

subtitles.original: キミにファンタスティックしたい　I Know You
subtitles.english: I want to be fantastic for you, I Know You

subtitles.original: まってこれはまだ
subtitles.english: Wait, this is still...

subtitles.original: なんて言ってもほら
subtitles.english: Whatever I say, see...

subtitles.original: だって表面じゃまだ
subtitles.english: Because on the surface, still...

subtitles.original: ほんとは中度の
subtitles.english: Actually, it's moderate...

subtitles.original: ハート・曖昧性・脳・ハード・バイバイ・ゲー
subtitles.english: Heart, ambiguity, brain, hard, bye-bye, game

subtitles.original: エブリデイ・妄想・で・この気持ちを・捏造して
subtitles.english: Every day, delusions, fabricating these feelings

subtitles.original: なんて言っちゃったら　不安丸見えじゃん
subtitles.english: If I say that, my anxiety will be exposed

subtitles.original: そんなの絶対許しません！　キミだけコソコソ行かせません！
subtitles.english: I absolutely won't allow that! I won't let you sneak away alone!

subtitles.original: デレてなんかいナイナイよ　気づいたなら即マイマイよ
subtitles.english: I'm not being lovey-dovey at all, if you notice, then immediately dance

subtitles.original: 独り占めしたい　二人きりでいたい　そんなのちっとも思わない
subtitles.english: I want you to myself, I want to be alone together, I don't think that at all

subtitles.original: 全部嘘っていうのは嘘っていうのは嘘で
subtitles.english: Saying it's all a lie is a lie is a lie

subtitles.original: どうしたらいいの　こんがらがって解けなくて
subtitles.english: What should I do? It's all tangled and I can't untie it

subtitles.original: ほんとはわかってわかってるよ
subtitles.english: Actually, I know, I know

subtitles.original: ユー、アンド、ミー、素直（ピュア）おぼつかない
subtitles.english: You and me, being honest is shaky

subtitles.original: ほどキミとの境界　溶かしたい
subtitles.english: I want to melt the boundary with you as much as possible

subtitles.original: 各・種・まで・エゴって
subtitles.english: Each, kind, until, ego-searching

subtitles.original: まだ押し倒したい押し倒したい　この求愛本能
subtitles.english: Still want to pin you down, pin you down, this courtship instinct

subtitles.original: からでまわる　わたしのフィーリング
subtitles.english: Empty spinning, my feeling

subtitles.original: いま立ってるまわってるハート　かなり痛いけど
subtitles.english: The heart that's standing and spinning now, it hurts quite a bit but

subtitles.original: だめだ止まれだめ押ししたい
subtitles.english: No, stop, I want to give the finishing blow

subtitles.original: キミでやまない　ノー、ノー、ユー、ノー、ミー
subtitles.english: Won't stop with you, No, No, You Know Me

subtitles.original: 超えてみせて　ふたりの深層
subtitles.english: Show me by going beyond, our depths
